item.title: CEMTREX INC S-1
item.description: CEMTREX INC, which is in the Electronic Components & Accessories [3670] industry, SEC S-1 filing on February 15, 2022 had 17311 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: stock - 277 instances company - 228 instances 1 - 210 instances may - 189 instances preferred - 178 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
